Reviews.Content: stayed nights march 2010 main reason booked hotel location round corner union station perfect arriving departing train walking distance entertainment district bars restaurants yonge street eaton centre shopping fairly nicely decorated bathroom clean fairly modern bad walls thin hear lot noise people coming nearby try cafe pub cant comment overall hotel sights toronto priced stay return toronto

Reviews.Title: “Not much to discuss-dated dirty noisy”
Reviews.Author: Bossdog80
Reviews.Content: stayed night attending social event tiny bed soft sheets poor quality noisy electric heater wall freezing arrival quickly hot dry 50 wall heater wallpaper peeling bathroom dated dirty stayed becuase hotels paid hundred

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: jlmOntario
Reviews.Content: stayed numerous times due cheap compared clean ones look pictures website price book advance especially regards location hotel parking nearby underneath building reasonable rates restaurantlounge hotel busy location fantastic close cn tower acc hockey hall fame shopping theatres walk stay fancy elegant probably hotel looking location half price dont mind definately reccommend

Reviews.Title: “Cool Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Dabrador
Reviews.Content: whenever travel business try hotels especially boutique style hotels strathcona nice lots potential checkin pleasant quick newly remodeled wood floors liked cleaner entering classical music playing clock touch european feel didnt fat bed comfortable quiet stain bed spread stay enjoyable

Reviews.Title: “Convenient”
Reviews.Author: raticca01
Reviews.Content: expereince staff helpful polite hotel smack middle downtown easy access public transportation research shocked price paid definitely worth

Reviews.Title: “Good at a reduced price”
Reviews.Author: moderate12
Reviews.Content: stayed standard strathcona night business trip reduced rate 79 plus 10 wireless access decor nice relatively modern front desk staff courteous responded routine requests expected table tv laptop book fine overall clean stray hairs left bathroom wireless 10 routine internet email heating unit wall fine bit noisy setting fine low medium thermostat wasnt ideal location convenient main reason booked wasnt noise

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, modern rooms!”
Reviews.Author: OttoCal
Reviews.Content: stayed strathcona ago loved convenient location reasonable rate recent trip toronto concert air canada centre dug info check remembered sort oldfashioned couldnt beat combination rate location checking website discovered hotel undergoing tons renovations choose renovated queen suite level level basic renovated loved modern decorations touches seen bag waters snacks checked nice parking toronto challenge expensive underground garage vast blocks hotel entrance pay attention loved walking distance acc cn tower hockey hall fame plenty shopping metro system figured routes easy bit trouble rail station instead subway station oops toronto incredible bargain compared nyc canadas largest city manhattan similar central location similar quality 3 times price city fun city prices strathcona try hotel spend money toronto hotels major chains didnt feel location chains happy price value strathcona notethe pub lower level hotel stay late advertised closed people didnt try pub restaurant safe underground walkways shops
